description: Tools and tech I use for coding and building projects

body.name: Visual Studio Code
body.description: My go-to code editor for writing and editing code.

body.name: Ghostty
body.description: A new, fast terminal emulator I'm trying out. Built to be a modern and hackable alternative.

body.name: Homebrew
body.description: My package manager for easily installing software on my Mac.

body.name: Postman
body.description: An awesome tool for building and testing APIs.

body.name: httpie
body.description: A user-friendly command-line HTTP client for making requests.

body.name: Oh My Zsh
body.description: A framework that extends the functionality of my Zsh shell.

body.name: Starship
body.description: A cool prompt theme that gives my terminal a sleek look.

body.name: Reddit Mono
body.description: My preferred font for coding. It's clean, legible, and helps me stay focused on my code.

body.name: Catppuccin
body.description: A soothing, cat-themed dark theme I use across my apps for a cozy and eye-friendly coding experience.
